article_title: SEC Ex-Enforcement Chief Calls for Reforms to In-House Judges
article_text:
A former Securities and Exchange Commission enforcement chief called Tuesday for changes in the agency’s system of in-house judges to “end the very grave appearance of injustice.”

George Canellos, who last year stepped down as co-director of the SEC’s enforcement division, told a legal conference in New York that “there is a lot to be desired...
